items.sentence: It would be good if you could do that for Tom.
I'm afraid that I'm not at liberty to do that.
I can't say for certain that Tom will do that.
There's no chance Tom will ask you to do that.
There's a good chance that Tom has to do that.
There's not much chance that Tom will do that.
There's a good chance Tom will do that for us.
There's a chance Tom won't be able to do that.
I don't think Tom knows I hardly ever do that.
I don't think Tom knows I don't often do that.
